title: HRU is a guardian app focused on user health and safety
start: Check in daily, peace of mind for your loved ones 💖
desc1: HRU is an online safety check-in tool for people living alone or with distant family. Just check in daily and your loved ones will have peace of mind.
step1: 1. Click the 'Check-in' button every day to show you are safe.
step2: 2. Set up your emergency contact's email.
step3: 3. If you don't check in for 3 days, the system will automatically email your emergency contact.
author: Author: Feifei Chen <feifeichen1999@gmail.com>
punch_success: Check-in successful! Your loved ones are at ease 💖
confirm_delete_contact: Are you sure you want to delete this contact?
login_subtitle: Please enter your email. A magic login link will be sent to your inbox.
logged_in_redirecting: Already logged in, redirecting to home...
login_link_sent: Login link sent to your email. Please check your inbox.
